text: I am away in the US most of the time in the past 20 years, but I have always ordered from Wonderful Flora gifts and flowers to express my care, concern and love for my family and friends. Each time, the recipient only has wonderful comments to say about the items I sent to them from Wonderful Flora. I have also recommended to numerous friends in the US to Wonderful Flora and they too, have been so pleased with the range and prices of items found at Wonderful Flora. So, a big thank you, to Wonderful Flora for helping us make this world a better place for all.
Ordered Mother's Day flowers to be scheduled and the company had contacted the recipient with a receipt and schedule of the delivery. Don't use them if you want to surprise someone...
Throught singapore no other online florist is as prompt as wonderful flora that assist you to get a bouquet or flowers of your choice without any hassle.
I made an online order from overseas, the delivery was on time, amazing flowers and bucket; easy to online order. Thanks Wonderful Flura team
This is my second time ordering online at Wonderful Flora. Value for money and timeliness on delivery
